snippet: Facing a torrent of criticism, Mr. Bush tried to clarify remarks suggesting that, despite the intelligence failures, he still would have invaded Iraq. It was the third time in six weeks that Mr. Bush had to recast something.
abstract: Jeb Bush claims to have misunderstood question to which he responded that he would still have authorized 2003 invasion of Iraq, which drew criticism from both Democrats and some conservatives; it is third time Bush has had to clarify statements, showing that he is still new to national campaign trail, despite his pedigree.
lead_paragraph: Facing a torrent of criticism, Mr. Bush tried to clarify remarks suggesting that, despite the intelligence failures, he still would have invaded Iraq. It was the third time in six weeks that Mr. Bush had to recast something.

headline.main: Jeb Bush Says He Misinterpreted Iraq Query
headline.print_headline: Bush Says He Misinterpreted Iraq Query
